org.apache.openmeetings.core.session.store

Class HashMapStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.openmeetings.core.session.store.HashMapStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClientPersistenceStore

    public class HashMapStore
extends Object
implements IClientPersistenceStore
    Stores the session in the memory. Is NOT designed to be clustered across multiple servers.
    • client by streamid
    • client by publicSID
    • client by userId
    • clients by roomId
    • roomIds by server
    Author:
    sebawagner
